issue.title: [CF 376] Flashing icons
issue.body:
What version of TellMeWhen are you using? - 4.7.1

I used to have a workaround to make an flashing icon, but it doesn't work anymore.

Example:

                        {
                            ["Enabled"] = true,
                            ["Type"] = "buff",
                            ["Name"] = "Dark Flames",
                            ["ShowWhen"] = "unalpha",
                            ["Conditions"] = {
                                {
                                    ["Type"] = "ICON",
                                    ["Icon"] = "TellMeWhen_Group1_Icon8",
                                    ["Level"] = 1,
                                }, -- [1]
                                {
                                    ["Type"] = "COMBAT",
                                }, -- [2]
                                {
                                    ["Type"] = "TREE",
                                    ["Level"] = 3,
                                }, -- [3]
                                ["n"] = 3,
                            },
                        },

So the main trick is - show the icon, when the same icon is hidden (the first condition). The question is - can you make it work again or implement some feature for this?

I know this ticket correlates with ticket #350, but still it's a very expected feature!


> Posted by CurseForge user rokker9 | Imported from CurseForge issue #376 | Raw

comments.body:
the working version was 4.6.7


> Posted by CurseForge user rokker9

This probably stopped working due to the change "Icons should no longer update themselves multiple times within one update period when the update interval is set to zero and the icon is being checked by multiple metas/conditions."

And no, I don't plan on restoring this functionality because it is ultimately a bug. You will just have to wait for work to complete on ticket #350.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
